mapper.sql: log_id, user_id, user_money, frozen_money, rank_points, pay_points, change_time, change_desc, change_type
mapper.update: update ecs_account_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_money = #{userMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, frozen_money = #{frozenMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rank_points = #{rankPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_points = #{payPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, change_desc = #{changeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
